TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Hanbizan, title = Hanbizan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hanbizan} }

S.FORM: == Hanbizan == u sulit nu Hulam: 涵碧蘭部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Nantou a kuwan ku niyazu' nu Hanbizan. u kasalumaluma' nu Hanbizan sa, 74 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 245 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 158 ku tademaw, pakalatu 64%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 87 ku tademaw, pakalatu 36%. u asip nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Yuwatan(Bunun) 64%. u niyazu' nu Yuwatan(Bunun) u niyazu' nu Yuwatan(Bunun) kuyni, katuud ku Yuwatan(Bunun) itini mueneng. inayi' tu ku zuma cidekay a tademaw itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u siwkay nu Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bulad pulung sausi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yuwatan (58,465), Rukay (13,319), Puyuma (14,170), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taluku (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laaluwa (401), Kanakanabu (335), zuma (11,985)

== Hanbizan == o solit no Holam: 涵碧蘭部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Nantoo a kowan ko niyazo' no Hanbizan. o kasalomaloma' no Hanbizan sa, 74 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 245 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 158 ko tademaw, pakalato 64%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 87 ko tademaw, pakalato 36%. o asip no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Yowatan(Bonon) 64%. o niyazo' no Yowatan(Bonon) o niyazo' no Yowatan(Bonon) koyni, katood ko Yowatan(Bonon) itini moeneng. inayi' to ko zoma cidekay a tademaw itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o siwkay no Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bolad polong saosi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yowatan (58,465), Rokay (13,319), Poyoma (14,170), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taloko (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laalowa (401), Kanakanabo (335), zoma (11,985)
